column3:
Vuyargur needs someone to pick blooming flowers.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Collect crimson Karvarhur blooms on the northern banks of Karvarhur the First.
Deliver the crimson Karvarhur blooms to the beleaguered brewer in Zirgorteh the Open-armed.
In the course of the brewery's work to produce kirkahryar, they happened to create a corn-based beverage the workers find quite rejuvenating.
Alongside kirkahryar, the brewery produces a corn-based beverage that is quite popular among the workers.

In fact, they can scarce keep up with demand, and the stock of ingredients is entirely depleted. As an artisan yourself, I suspect you have an eye for high-quality produce—would you mind picking some crimson Karvarhur blooms?
We simmer them with the corn, and they grow on the northern shore of Karvarhur the First. Once you've collected a few blooms, please deliver them directly to the brewery.
If you're here for the corn drink, I'm afraid you're out of luck! We've been drunk dry, and haven't the ingredients to make more...
As I said, we're out of─ What? Crimson Karvarhur blooms!? Have you come to replenish our stores?
Oh, thank you! Now I can get that thirsty lot off my back! Time to get to work!
Now I can get that thirsty lot off my back─once this batch is ready!
I hear you delivered the flowers. Thank you, it is quite the trek to Karvarhur the First.
Simmering them with corn and spice results in a fragrant, deep red—almost purple—beverage. Some swear by its restorative effects, and the ingredients are certainly wholesome enough.
Given its popularity, I suspect we may find ourselves in a similar predicament again soon. I only hope supplies last long enough for me to get a drink myself!
